description: This file defines API routes for managing memberships and membership plans in a gym management system using FastAPI. It includes endpoints for listing, creating, updating, deleting, and cancelling memberships, as well as managing membership plans, with access control based on user roles.

classes.name: MembershipPlanResponse
classes.description: Schema for response data of a membership plan

classes.name: MembershipResponse
classes.description: Schema for response data of memberships

methods.name: list_plans(db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Endpoint to list all membership plans

methods.name: create_plan( plan_data: MembershipPlanCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_admin) )
methods.description: Endpoint to create a new membership plan (admin only)

methods.name: update_plan( plan_id: int, plan_data: MembershipPlanUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_admin) )
methods.description: Endpoint to update an existing membership plan (admin only)

methods.name: delete_plan( plan_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_admin) )
methods.description: Endpoint to delete a membership plan (admin only)

methods.name: list_memberships( db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user) )
methods.description: Endpoint to list memberships, either all for admin or personal for users

methods.name: create_membership( membership_data: MembershipCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_admin) )
methods.description: Endpoint to create a new membership for a member (admin only)

methods.name: cancel_membership( membership_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_admin) )
methods.description: Endpoint to cancel a membership (admin only)

ctags.name: cancel_membership
ctags.signature: ( membership_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_admin) )

ctags.name: create_membership
ctags.signature: ( membership_data: MembershipCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_admin) )

ctags.name: create_plan
ctags.signature: ( plan_data: MembershipPlanCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_admin) )

ctags.name: delete_plan
ctags.signature: ( plan_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_admin) )

ctags.name: list_memberships
ctags.signature: ( db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user) )

ctags.name: update_plan
ctags.signature: ( plan_id: int, plan_data: MembershipPlanUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_admin) )
